title: Is a Virginia Church Ripping Out an ‘Offensive’ George Washington Plaque?
subtitle: An Alexandria church's decision to relocate two plaques due to ongoing controversy over memorials to Robert E. Lee was misrepresented as a decision that George Washington might "offend" parishioners.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Christ Church in Alexandria, Virginia, is "ripping out" a plaque dedicated to George Washington because it might offend people.
